name: GO2E OTM
description: GO2E is a Web 3.0 fitness app with inbuilt Game-Fi, Social-Fi, and Metaverse elements; aiming to become an innovative mobile solution for the next generation of fitness enthusiasts who want to socialize and be active in both virtuality and reality. OTM is the game token and is earned when a user joins GO2E game modes OTM Tokens are burned by: - Repair Sneakers - Level up Sneakers - Upgrade Jewels - Unlock Socket
